name: Desolator
description: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: The wielder's successful attack applies an armor reduction debuff on the affected enemy unit.
notes: The bonus armor reduction value does not stack
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Affects allied units, buildings, and ward-type units
Weaker sources do not reduce armor if a stronger source is present, except for Desolator and Stygian Desolator, which stack with each other

abilities.name: Soul Stealer
abilities.description: Increases the item's bonus attack damage per debuff-affected enemy hero killed by Corruption.
notes: The item grants 85 total flat bonus attack damage at max stacks
Considers The Double, enemy illusions and creep-heroes as creeps
Only the first acquired Desolator grants stacks in the wielder's inventory or backpack
Grant stacks to the most recent player who refreshed the desolator_buff
The current stack is bound to the item
Non-functional on self-illusions, but they copy the item's stack value upon creation for camouflaging purposes

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
